div.p:
READY TO GO ON
A READING ADVENTURE?

IN THIS STORY, WE'LL
USE THE ALPHABET...

AND USE THE POWER TO READ
TO CHANGE THE STORY.

♪♪ WHO ANSWERS THE CALL
FOR FRIENDS IN NEED? ♪♪

♪♪ HE'S THE GUY
HE'S SUPER WHY ♪♪

♪♪ WHO'S GOT THE POWER
THE POWER TO READ? ♪♪

♪♪ WHO LOOKS INTO BOOKS
FOR THE ANSWERS WE NEED? ♪♪

♪♪ AND THE SUPER READERS
WE'RE GONNA FLY ♪♪

♪♪ ADVENTURE WAITS WHEN
YOU'RE WITH SUPER WHY ♪♪

♪♪ SUPER WHY AND
THE SUPER READERS ♪♪

♪♪ SUPER WHY AND
THE SUPER READERS ♪♪

♪♪ ADVENTURE WAITS WHEN
YOU'RE WITH SUPER WHY ♪♪

WHERE ALL OUR
FAIRY-TALE FRIENDS LIVE!

PIG'S PLAYING
WITH A TOY CAR.

WATCH IT
GO REALLY,
REALLY FAST.

HEY, WHYATT, YOU
KNOW WHAT WOULD
BE EVEN MORE FUN
THAN ONE TOY CAR?

THEN I COULD
RACE ALL OF THEM!

I ONLY HAVE
THIS ONE CAR.

THIS SOUNDS LIKE
A SUPER BIG PROBLEM.

AND A SUPER BIG
PROBLEM NEEDS US...

WE NEED TO CALL THE REST
OF THE SUPER READERS.

Children: [ In audience ]
CALLING ALL
SUPER READERS!

[ Remote phone ringing ]
TO THE BOOK CLUB!
TO THE BOOK CLUB!

COME ON,
TO THE BOOK CLUB!

TOGETHER, WE WILL
SOLVE PIG'S PROBLEM!

I HAVE ONE
REALLY FUN TOY CAR,

WHAT DO I
DO IF I WANT
MORE TOY CARS?

WHICH BOOK
SHOULD WE LOOK IN?

PEAS AND CARROTS,
CARROTS AND PEAS.

BOOK COME OUT,
PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE!

LET'S READ THE TITLE
OF THIS BOOK.

WE NEED TO JUMP
INTO THIS BOOK...

AND FIND THE ANSWER
TO PIG'S QUESTION.

FIRST, WE LOOK
FOR SUPER LETTERS.

HOW MANY SUPER LETTERS
DO WE NEED?

[ Triumphant ♪♪♪♪♪♪ ]
OUR SUPER STORY ANSWER!
IT'S TIME TO TRANSFORM.

SUPER WHY,
WITH THE POWER TO READ!

WE'RE READY TO FLY
INTO THIS BOOK!

♪♪ IT'S TIME TO FLY
WITH THE SUPER READERS ♪♪

♪♪ 'CAUSE WE'VE GOT
A PROBLEM TO SOLVE ♪♪

♪♪ WORKING TOGETHER
WITH POWERS TO READ ♪♪

♪♪ TO FIND
THE SUPER STORY ANSWER ♪♪

[ Gasp ]
KING MIDAS WANTS MORE GOLD,

JUST LIKE I WANT
MORE TOY CARS!

IS WHY WE ARE
IN THIS BOOK.

PIG AND KING MIDAS
BOTH WANT MORE.

THAT EVERYTHING I
TOUCH WITH THIS FINGER

NOW, THANKS TO MY
SPECIAL GOLDEN FINGER,

EVERYTHING I TOUCH
WILL TURN TO GOLD,

AND I'LL HAVE
LOTS MORE GOLD.

OOH, THE PATH,
THE PATH, THE PATH.

ALL OF THIS TURNING
THINGS TO GOLD

I'D LIKE A BIG,
TALL GLASS OF MILK.

BUT DO YOU KNOW WHAT
WOULD BE EVEN BETTER?

I CAN FIND THE LETTERS
IN THE WORD "MILK"

AND CHANGE THE GOLD
BACK INTO MILK!

NOW WHERE'S
THE LETTER
"M"?
Children:
THERE!

ONLY ONE MORE
LETTER TO GO!

WE TURNED THE GOLD
BACK INTO MILK!

LET'S GIVE OURSELVES
A BIG THUMBS UP!

BE SURE TO KEEP
YOUR EYES OUT
FOR SUPER LETTERS!

NOW I'M READY TO
MAKE MORE GOLD!

LET'S PUT THEM IN
OUR SUPER DUPER...

AND THEN WE'LL GET
OUR SUPER STORY ANSWER!

YOU DO HAVE
A LOT OF GOLD.

WE HEARD YOU'VE GOT
THE "GOLDEN TOUCH"!

OH, I JUST LOVE SWIMMING
IN MY FISHY FOUNTAIN!

UH-OH. I... I
CAN'T MOVE AT ALL!

I'VE TURNED
THE WATER INTO GOLD

AND TURN THE GOLD
BACK TO WATER.

TAKE OUT YOUR MAGIC
SPELLING WANDS!

AND TURNED THE GOLD
BACK TO WATER.

YOU MIGHT TURN IT
BACK INTO GOLD!

UH, LET'S GO
GET SOME FOOD!

NOW WE NEED TO PUT THEM
IN OUR SUPER DUPER...

AND THEN WE'LL GET
OUR SUPER STORY ANSWER!

YOU KNOW WHAT
WOULD BE BETTER
THAN THIS FOOD?

DO YOU LIKE
MY GOLD FOOD?

WE CAN'T EAT FOOD
THAT'S MADE OF GOLD!

WE HAVEN'T
EVEN FINISHED
OUR GOLD DINNER!

I CAN'T TALK AND PLAY
WITH MY GOLD FRIENDS.

MAYBE I'LL JUST
HAVE A LITTLE SNACK.

I CAN'T EAT
MY GOLD FOOD!

I DON'T WANT
ALL THIS GOLD.

BUT ALAS,
IT IS MY STORY.

I CAN CHANGE THIS STORY
AND SAVE THE DAY!

SUPER READERS, WHAT IS
THE OPPOSITE OF "MORE"?

LET'S READ IT AND
SEE WHAT HAPPENS.

DID LESS GOLD
HELP KING MIDAS?

AND KING MIDAS
HAS LESS GOLD!

FOR MY ONE
PIECE OF GOLD.

LET'S PUT THEM IN
OUR SUPER DUPER...

WE FOUND ALL OF
OUR SUPER LETTERS.

NOW WE CAN GET
OUR SUPER STORY ANSWER!

Super Readers:
GOODBYE, KING MIDAS!
GOODBYE, FRIENDS!

♪♪ WE FOUND THE
SUPER STORY ANSWER ♪♪

GIVE US OUR
SUPER STORY ANSWER!

REALIZED HE DIDN'T NEED
A WHOLE KINGDOM OF GOLD

FOR HIS ONE SPECIAL
PIECE OF GOLD.

WHAT SHOULD
I DO IF I WANT
MORE TOY CARS?

I SHOULD BE THANKFUL
FOR MY ONE TOY CAR.

HEY! WATCH
MY CAR DO THIS!

AWESOME,
LOOK AT IT GO!
OH, LOOK AT THAT!

I GUESS ONE CAR CAN
STILL BE PRETTY FUN.

YOU REALLY DON'T
WANT MORE, HUH?

I'M THANKFUL
FOR THE ONE
TOY CAR I HAVE.

THE SUPER READERS
SAVE THE DAY!

♪♪ THE SUPER READERS
SAVE THE DAY ♪♪

♪♪ WE WORKED TOGETHER
SO HIP, HIP, HOORAY! ♪♪

♪♪ THE SUPER READERS
SAVE THE DAY ♪♪

♪♪ THE SUPER READERS
SAVE THE DAY! ♪♪

♪♪ PUT IT ALL TOGETHER
AND WHAT DOES IT SPELL? ♪♪
